title: Savings
info: Setting financial goals and cultivating a savings habit are critical components of achieving financial stability and success. They provide direction, motivation, and a sense of purpose for your financial efforts, and they can help you build wealth and prepare for unexpected expenses.
emptyList: No goals found. Create a new goal

modal.subtitle: What are you saving for?
modal.deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your goal
modal.errorAmount: The field can only contain numeric values
modal.errorDepositedAmount: The deposited amount cannot exceed the goal amount
modal.errorDepositedAmountTakeFrom: You cannot withdraw more than the amount previously deposited
modal.errorDepositedAmountTwo: The deposit amount cannot be equal to the goal amount
modal.labelImage: Drop your image here or browse
